references.reason: This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for the field, which are the subject of acceleration in this paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper extended DDPMs by introducing continuous-time diffusion models, which are also analyzed and accelerated in this paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the exceptional image generation capabilities of diffusion models, motivating further research into their efficiency.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced Stable Diffusion, a prominent model used in this paper's experiments, showcasing the practical impact of diffusion models.
This paper introduced DDIM, a fast sampling method for diffusion models and a baseline for comparison in this paper's acceleration techniques.
